title: Flags of the World Watch Face
summary: Flags of the World in your wrist! Watch Face. Display one of 196 countries +more

descriptionHTML:
World Flags - 196 Countries in one Android Wear Watch Face

Features:
★ Display your favourite flag in your SmartWatch.
★ Choose from 196 Countries (100 flags available in v1.0.0).
★ Flag Listing in Alphabetic Order.
★ Analog and digital version inside.
★ Preview of realistic, waving flag effect (Animated Flags ready for download in our other apps).
★ Tap to start / stop the animation (in animation mode).
★ Double tap to change date and day information.
★ Mobile and wear app.
★ Ambient mode background support.
★ many more (customizable features) still to come...

Apps for Animated (World) Flags Watch Face avaliable in our personal page.

If you spot something wrong please feedback me - app will be updated frequently.

If you liked our application or if you want to suggest any changes please send us your feedback on brostudiodev@gmail.com

On next release you will find:
1. More customizable options - change color of watch hands, hands mode and graphic
2. Display battery indicator
3. Add always ambient mode

Flags of the World (v1.0.0 includes 100 flags. Next flags will be added in further releases):

comments: Sri lankan flag is wrong The main part of Sri Lankan flag "the lion" is missing!
I like the idea of flag on your watch... Good job
recentChanges: ★ You can now individually change colors of almost every element of the Watch Face:
Analog: change hands style change second, date and ticks (normal and ambient mode)
Digital: change time, date (normal and ambient mode).
